content: lion brand pattern # 70263a skill level easy level 2 lion® organic cotton article #680 *discontinued* 4 colors 246 yards each *lion brand #480 nature s choice organic® cotton yarn can be substituted * crochet hook - size i-9 special stitch 5-double_crochet shell work blanket in shell in alternating row of color finish with shell border crochet terms are in u s terminology see 70505ad ocean waves baby afghan 1 for a similar pattern in lion brand cotton-ease 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ocean-waves-baby-afghan
